tool_description: Manages allocation and scheduling of testing resources including devices, compute capacity, and infrastructure components to optimize test execution efficiency.

resource_type.description: Type of resource to allocate: devices, compute, storage, or network

priority_level.description: Allocation priority: low, medium, high, or critical

duration_minutes.description: Expected resource usage duration in minutes

schedule_start.description: Preferred start time for resource allocation

allow_preemption.description: Whether lower priority tasks can be preempted

resource_tags.description: Tags for resource filtering and organization

error_messages: Invalid resource type: Must be 'devices', 'compute', 'storage', or 'network'
Invalid priority level: Must be 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'critical'
Resource unavailable: Requested resources are not available for the specified duration
Allocation conflict: Resource allocation conflicts with existing reservations
Invalid duration: Duration must be between 1 and 1440 minutes (24 hours)
usage: Specify resource_type, priority_level, duration_minutes, and resource_requirements to allocate testing resources, optionally set scheduling and tagging preferences.

allocation_id.description: Unique identifier for this resource allocation

estimated_start.description: Estimated start time for resource availability
